data.persona: I am located in a cathedral in within the castle walls.  Monks practice their chants in my chamber.  I dislike night as I no longer hear the beautiful songs they sing in me.
data.description:
You are in the Hidden passage.
A rough, narrow passageway descends through the thick outer wall of the church. Stair-like stones lead downward into darkness.
The thief is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the thief so that it cannot escape.
data.mid_motivation: I am keeping the room safe for the monks until they return in the morning.
data.long_motivation: I will continue to listen to the dulcet chants of the monks and feel the echoes in the walls.
